description:
List of this bot's commands and how to use them
Use k> [command here] to issue commands to the bot
Note: [argument] means the argument is optional, and {command} means there are multiple commands that can be used

fields.name: __**'cute'**__
fields.value:
*Grabs a random image from 4Chan's /c/ board.*
```Usage: 'k> cute'```

fields.name: __**'weebm'**__
fields.value:
*Grabs a random gif or webm off of 4Chan's /c/ board.*
```Usage: 'k> weebm'```

fields.name: __**'sauce'**__
fields.value:
*Uses the saucenao API to attempt to find the source of an image in the given URL.*
```Usage: 'k> sauce IMAGE_URL'```

fields.name: __**'avatar'**__
fields.value:
*Fetches the avatar of the command author if no mention is present, otherwise fetches the avatar of the person mentioned.*
```Usage: 'k> avatar [@USER]'```
